title: Indelible
description: Colorado search-and-rescue volunteer Trevor MacDaniel saves a boy from a mountain lion, and meets the youngster's aunt, sculptor Natalie Reeve. But their own turbulent pasts, an unfamiliar present danger---and Natalie's unusual gift---threaten their relationship. When a twisted mind sees Trevor as an adversary, can the hero save himself? 336 pages
author: Kristen Heitzmann
